data.title: 2024 Election Candidates
data.text:
Last updated on 06/20/2024

Orange County Candidates

Primary Election: August 20, 2024

General Election: November 5, 2024

Find My District

View 2024 County Candidate reports filed

View prior reports filed on our Searchable Campaign Finance Database

Municipal Candidates: Contact municipal clerks directly for information regarding current officeholders, municipal offices open for election, qualifying for municipal office, and results from previous municipal elections. Visit our list of municipal websites.

State Candidates (Division of Elections Website)

County Qualifying Dates for 2024 Election: Noon, June 10, 2024, through noon, June 14, 2024 (dates subject to change)

Glen Gilzean, Orange County Supervisor of Elections

Street Address: 119 West Kaley Street, Orlando, FL 32806

Mailing Address: P.O. BOX 562001, Orlando, FL 32856-2001

Office: 407-836-2070 â€¢ Fax: 407-254-6596

Florida has a very broad public records law. As a result, any written communication created or received by the Orange County Supervisor of Elections Office will be made available to the public and media, upon request, unless otherwise exempt. Under Florida law, F.S. 668.6076, e-mail addresses are public records. If you do not want your e-mail address released in response to a public records request, do not send electronic mail to this office. Instead, contact our office by phone or in writing.
